member.summary: AZ name, such as "ap-beijing-1". For the list of regions and AZs, please see [Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/582/13225?from_cn_redirect=1)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.NetInterface
member.summary: Network type. Valid values: `VPC` (private network), `BASIC` (classic network), `CCN` (Cloud Connect Network). You must set this parameter to `CCN` if you use the Turbo series. Classic network will be phased out and is not recommended.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.PGroupId
member.summary: Permission group ID (required for Standard and High-Performance). For the Turbo series, set it to `pgroupbasic`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.Protocol
member.summary: File system protocol. Valid values: `NFS`, `CIFS`, `TURBO`. If this parameter is left empty, `NFS` is used by default. For the Turbo series, you must set this parameter to `TURBO`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.StorageType
member.summary: Storage class of the file system. Valid values: `SD` (Standard), `HP` (High-Performance), `TB` (Standard Turbo), `TP` (High-Performance Turbo)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.VpcId
member.summary: VPC ID. This field is required if network type is VPC.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.SubnetId
member.summary: Subnet ID. This field is required if network type is VPC.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.MountIP
member.summary: IP address (this parameter supports only the VPC network type, and the Turbo series is not supported). If this parameter is left empty, a random IP in the subnet will be assigned.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.FsName
member.summary: Custom file system name

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.ResourceTags
member.summary: File system tag

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.ClientToken
member.summary: A unique string supplied by the client to ensure that the request is idempotent. Its maximum length is 64 ASCII characters. If this parameter is not specified, the idempotency of the request cannot be guaranteed. This string is valid for 2 hours.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.CcnId
member.summary: CCN instance ID (required if the network type is CCN)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.CidrBlock
member.summary: CCN IP range used by the CFS (required if the network type is CCN), which cannot conflict with other IP ranges bound in CCN

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsFileSystemRequest.Capacity
member.summary: File system capacity, in GiB (required for the Turbo series). For Standard Turbo, the minimum purchase required is 40,960 GiB (40 TiB) and the expansion increment is 20,480 GiB (20 TiB). For High-Performance Turbo, the minimum purchase required is 20,480 GiB (20 TiB) and the expansion increment is 10,240 GiB (10 TiB).

member.summary: You can enter a single IP or IP range, such as 10.1.10.11 or 10.10.1.0/24. The default visiting address is `*`, indicating that all IPs are allowed. Please note that you need to enter the CVM instance's private IP here.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsRuleRequest.Priority
member.summary: Rule priority. Value range: 1-100. 1 represents the highest priority, while 100 the lowest

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.CreateCfsRuleRequest.UserPermission
member.summary: User permission. Valid values: all_squash, no_all_squash, root_squash, no_root_squash. Specifically, all_squash: any visiting user will be mapped to an anonymous user or user group; no_all_squash: a visiting user will be first matched with a local user, and if the match fails, it will be mapped to an anonymous user or user group; root_squash: a visiting root user will be mapped to an anonymous user or user group; no_root_squash: a visiting root user will be allowed to maintain root account permissions. Default value: root_squash.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.UpdateCfsRuleRequest.AuthClientIp
member.summary: You can enter a single IP or IP range, such as 10.1.10.11 or 10.10.1.0/24. The default visiting address is `*`, indicating that all IPs are allowed. Please note that you need to enter the CVM instance's private IP here.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.UpdateCfsRuleRequest.UserPermission
member.summary: User permission. Valid values: all_squash, no_all_squash, root_squash, no_root_squash. Specifically, all_squash: any visiting user will be mapped to an anonymous user or user group; no_all_squash: a visiting user will be first matched with a local user, and if the match fails, it will be mapped to an anonymous user or user group; root_squash: a visiting root user will be mapped to an anonymous user or user group; no_root_squash: a visiting root user will be allowed to maintain root account permissions. Default value: root_squash.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Cfs.V20190719.Models.UpdateCfsRuleRequest.Priority
member.summary: Rule priority. Value range: 1-100. 1 represents the highest priority, while 100 the lowest
